headline: Salesforce Acquires Moonhub — The AI Recruiting Startup Joins $8B Informatica Deal In AI Hiring Revolution
summary: Moonhub announced Monday that it has bewen acquired by Salesforce (NYSE:CRM), marking a new chapter for the AI-powered recruiting startup founded by former Meta (NASDAQ:META) engineer Nancy Xu. The move comes on the heels of Salesforce's recent $8 billion acquisition of Informatica and signals a clear acceleration of its AI-first product strategy, The Economic Times reports. Moonhub Built a Holistic, Bias-Conscious Approach to AI Hiring Founded in 2022 and backed by Khosla Ventures, TIME Venture

headline: Salesforce Beat Out IBM for $8 Billion Informatica Deal
summary: IBM held acquisition talks with Informatica before Salesforce closed the $8B deal
